name: Bears of Blight
description:
A rom-com puzzle adventure about two bears on a quest to kill a lich king

CONTROLS:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move
  • Space Bar to interact/match tiles
  • Hold Enter to drag tiles
    • NOTE: moving tiles does not automatically match them, use space bar for this!

MECHANICS

  • Fireball
    • Represented with the wizard's staff. When activated, will begin charging a fireball
    • Match in lines of three or greater
    • Special Shape: None!
    • Once the "evil eyes" appear, you've fully grown your fireball
  • Flame Sword
    • Represented with the sword icon
    • Match in lines of three or greater
    • Special Shape: Sword/Cross
      • This means a "plus" sign, with only one of the sides being 2 or more tiles long
  • Shields Up
    • Represented with the front facing shield icon
    • Shields last indefinitely, and prevent damage from enemies. Taking damage reduces shielding.
    • Special Shape: 3x3 AoE
      • Activating a shield pulls all nearby shields in a 3x3 around the reticle
    • There is a pair of bars on the side of the shield icon which represent how much shielding you have. Once it forms a full arrow, you've reached maximum shielding.
  • Shield Bash
    • Represented with the sideways "bashing" shield icon
    • Spends 5 of your shielding to do a little damage
    • Special Shape: 7 Wide
      • Activating a full row of 7 shield bashes will spend all your shielding, deal half that amount as damage, and stun the enemy.
